title: What technology is used in a school library? - Quora

response.answer_text: In our high school library in California, it is computers. All students have chromebooks. This gives them access to their lessons, textbooks online, e books, our library catalog and electronic research databases, google meets. Otherwise, we use Apple TV and a projector.

In general, institutional libraries should use some Library Management Software. A server has the database of all books and their classification details, details of members( the students and staff members). Well-funded schools and colleges also make use of barcodes for faster data entry. There might be some computers provided at key locations to be used as a digital catalog.
